name: Fish-Flavored Toast
desc: Klee's specialty. By way of apology for wantonly using her bombs to scare away the fish, Jean instructed Klee to make this toast for the fishermen. It's filling and tasty. Klee will never starve again, even after a whole day of blast fishing.

value.text: Increases all party members' DEF by 151 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

customize.name: Recipe: Fisherman's Toast
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Fisherman's Toast.

customize.name: Flour
customize.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

customize.name: Tomato
customize.desc: A bright red ingredient that gives a tangy kick. Yes, the "fruit or vegetable" debate is still going...

customize.name: Onion
customize.desc: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

customize.name: Milk
customize.desc: Sweet and fragrant cow's milk. Don't waste a single drop, not even that one rolling down your chin.

customize.name: Fisherman's Toast
customize.desc: Onion-covered toast. A favorite amongst fishermen, they will stuff a bag with it and sit by the river all day.

customize.name: Klee
customize.desc: An explosives expert and a regular at the Knights of Favonius's confinement room. Also known as Fleeing Sunlight.
